https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/fw4Ud0xQuUpdyuPOKUUq44UBmUG.jpg A follow-up to the documentary series reports on what has happened since author Michael Peterson was found guilty of murder. In an interview from prison, Peterson talks on camera for the first time since his trial. Death on the Staircase: The Aftermath
